definitions.title: adj.
definitions.body: helpless, unfortunate, only as subst. hapless, luckless one(s)—[[לְחֵֽלְכָה]] Ps 10:8, LXX ei)v to\n pe/nhta, SyrVer Targum; [[חֵלֶָכָה]] Ps 10:14 LXX o( ptwxo/v; [[חלכאים]] Ps 10:10 Kt, rd. pl. [[חַלְכָּאִים]] (´[[חֶל]], ´[[חָל]]); Qr [[חֵל כָּאִים]] LXX tw=n penm/twn. In all txt. and mng. dub. (MT rds. [[חֵלְכָה]] = [[חֵילְךָ]] thine army; and [[חֵל כָּאִים]] v:Ps 10:10 army of dejected ones, but this against usage of [[חֵל]], and no such fig. sense of [[חַיִל]], v. O1 Hup De Bae Che, and crit. n.)
